headline: Is Southern Set for Further Gains After Recent 19% Rally in 2025?
summary: If you are looking at Southern and wondering whether now is the time to buy, hold, or sell, you are certainly not alone. The stock recently hit $97.69, buzzing through a 30-day rally of 6.4% and bringing its year-to-date gain to an impressive 19.0%. Even taking a step back, its performance is hard to ignore with a 69.1% return over three years and 95.1% over the past five. The last week has been a bit quiet, down just 0.4%, but investor sentiment seems to be holding steady given the latest...
